#summary Object Description Language (ODL)
#labels Documentation,Featured

= Introduction =

The Object Description Language (ODL) is a data model driving [http://books.google.com/books?id=Ww1B9O_yVGsC&lpg=PP1&ots=Sd4I8gQelB&dq=Java%20Programming%20Language&pg=PP1#v=onepage&q=&f=false JPL] source code generation from Hapax3 templates.  

The GAP ODL process employs a [http://code.google.com/p/hapax2 Hapax2] template for transforming the ODL model into Java Programming Language (JPL) sourcecode. 

One example ODL file is for the online Hapax3 [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/odl/gap/hapax/Template.odl Template].

= Structure = 

An ODL source code unit has a highly defined structure in plain text format.
{{{
 package pkg.name
 path path-name

 class ClassName 
   [implements InterfaceName]*
 {
   [field-class] FieldType fieldName
 }
}}}

== Field classes ==

Fields optionally have a field-class prefix from one of

|| `*unique` || Required component of the instance natural identifier ||
|| `*transient` || Not persistent to Memcache or Datastore (enum types) ||
|| `*child` || [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/src/gap/odl/Field.java Field] [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/src/gap/service/od/FieldDescriptor.java Relation] class, see [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/web/WEB-INF/templates/BeanData.java.xtm BeanData.java.xtm] ||
|| `*sortby` || This field is the "default sort by" in listing the collection of instances of this class  ||

== Field types ==

Field types include
{{{
 gap.data.BigTable<ODL>
 gap.Primitives
 gap.data collections, List and Map
}}}
as handled in [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/src/gap/service/OD.java OD], and supported in [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/web/WEB-INF/templates/BeanData.java.xtm BeanData.java.xtm].

= Lists =

A [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/src/gap/data/List.java list] is defined in ODL as a field having type List Short or Long of Component.

For example in class [http://code.google.com/p/gap-data/source/browse/trunk/odl/gap/hapax/Template.odl  gap.hapax.Template] 
{{{
   List.Short<TemplateNode> templateTargetHapax
}}}
